title: Few Ezreal changes.
body:
Mainly for AP Ezreal.

**Passive: Rising Spell Force**
Attack Speed per stack increased to 12% from 10%

**Q: Mystic Shot**
Total AD ratio reduced to 100% from 110%
Base physical damage increased to 45/65/85/105/125 from 35/55/75/95/115

**W: Essence Flux**
Attack Speed buff reduced to 10/15/20/25/30% from 20/25/30/35/40%.
Now damages minions and monsters for 50% of total damage. Doesn't grant passive stacks for hitting minions/monsters.
Now leaves a mark on enemy champions hit. This mark priorizes your Arcane Shift's damage on the nearest marked enemy. Available at rank 3/4/5.

**E: Arcane Shift**
See above
AP ratio reduced to 70% from 75%

**R: Trueshot Barrage**
- Damage fall-off per unit reduced to 5% for minions and monsters from 10% (still at 10% against champions).

yes or nah?
